description: Capacity Building and Civic Education in support of Decentralization and Local Goverance in Tahiland

subproject.corporate outcome: National and sub-national level governance expand its capacities in addressing human security risks, and delivery of equitable public service with due consideration of the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups by grounding their standards of practice in the principles of human rights and good governance.
subproject.description:
(1) Enhanced capacity of local Government to implement decentralized social services  through policy evaluation on effectiveness of decentralization and its impact on the MDG achievement.
(2) Civil society actors including vulnerable groups with increased awareness and legal knowledge of their rights.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Capacity Building and Civic Ed

title: Capacity Building and Civic Education
